about_the_game:
Build your ultimate aquarium and water park!

Manage marine park and fill your aquarium with a huge selection of fish, from the famous clownfish to the scary looking great white shark. Keep them happy by feeding them their favourite feeds and upgrade their aquarium tank's decoration. You can make their aquarium to be as beautiful as the ocean nature, or make it horror to show more scary vibe, or even fill it with some mythology decorations.

Not only you can display fishes in various type of aquariums, you can also build attractions such as starfish touchpool and ice castle. And do not forget about the visitors. Build multiple yummy food stalls and drink stalls to keep them happy. And a lot of shops of course, so they can buy merchandises. A lot of stuffs can be bought to keep them happy and to make your marine park more awesome.

Display various marine species

Many different species to be researched and displayed in your aquarium. Each fish species have their own rating attributes, such as beauty, monster or rarity. Own and display them to satisfy the visitors.

Attractions

Not just looking at aquariums, visitors enjoy activities and attractions too. Whether it's touching a starfish or kissing a dolphin, build attractions to satisfy them more.

Food, drink and merchandise shops

Build food and drink stalls, or vendings, to fulfill your visitors needs. More importantly, build lots of merchandise shops so they can buy souvenirs and increase your profit.

Various levels and a secret level

Not just limited to one single park, you will be challenged to manage different parks with different scenario. There is also one secret level waiting to be completed.
